citations.narrative:
While the facility seeks care related to new issues identified pursuant to its written program of veterinary care, the facility
does not maintain records of these problems, examination findings, and subsequent treatments. This could result in
deviation from the prescribed treatments and affect the standard of care given. The facility must record dates and
descriptions of problems, findings, test results, and treatments and procedures.
Correct by 7/17/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
While the facility seeks care related to new issues identified pursuant to its written program of veterinary care, the facility 
does not maintain records of these problems, examination findings, and subsequent treatments. This could result in 
deviation from the prescribed treatments and affect the standard of care given. The facility must record dates and 
descriptions of problems, findings, test results, and treatments and procedures.  
 
Correct by 7/17/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
